Entity.name: Significant risk transfer securitisation
Entity.comment: Significant risk transfer is a member of Significant risk transfer indicator specifying if a securitisation establishes a significant risk transfer according to Regulation (EU) 575/2013, Article 243 (2) and Article 244 (2).
Entity.commentInRDBMS: Significant risk transfer securitisation is a Securitisation that establishes a significant risk transfer according to Regulation (EU) 575/2013, Article 243 (2) and Article 244 (2).
